title: FIX YOUR GOD DAMN SERVER
body: This is the second day that I've been experiencing a ton of latency in every single game I played. Ping went up, but not only that, there's around 1-1.5 sec delay on everything you do, also ping skyrockets at some point that everything in game freezes, and after 2 mins you're watching rewinded version of everything that happened. These updates fucked up your NA server really bad, and I'm saying NA because I was just checking the EUNE sever and it worked perfectly fine! From some reason you don't want to admit that problem is in your server, and now you can't blame it on my internet connection, because it is fucking not the problem.

replies.body:
I'd like to find out what's going on and get this fixed up for you, but need your help!  These issues and lag spikes usually result from network problems like packet loss, ISP routing, or something else entirely.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches to get an overview of what's going wrong.  You will receive a set of troubleshoot steps specific to your issue as well!  

In addition, I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities; specifically configuring your dns in case this is an ISP issue.  Let me know your results!
Yep, have been having the same issue even made a post about it lol
